alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Kossuth; Winnebago (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 15 at 6:32PM CST until December 15 at 7:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN KOSSUTH...NORTHWESTERN HANCOCK AND WESTERN WINNEBAGO COUNTIES... At 632 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles northeast of Union Slogh, or 19 miles west of Forest City, moving north at 80 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Kossuth, northwestern Hancock and western Winnebago Counties, including the following locations... Woden, Titonka, Buffalo Center, Rake, Lakota and Thompson. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
